page.title: 03Traditional Crafts, Priors M
page.content: {Bobbin Lace,}using original bobbins to make delicate lace edgings & small butterfly & flower motifs;{Weaving; {Wool Spinning,}using a hand spindle & a spinning wheel;{Corn Dollies; Hedge {Laying. One farmer's wife keeps 12{Jacob {Sheep}for their black & white fleece. She{prepares}the wool,{spins}it on a spinning wheel, then{knits}garments such as shawls, waistcoats, socks. The socks are good for chilblains! Other Arts & Crafts include - Embroidery, Canvas Embroidery, Soft Toys, Flower Arranging, Knitting, Silk Screen Printing, Crochet, Decorative Bead-work, Caning, Etching on Copper, Wood Turning, Wood Sculpture, Model Making, Pebble Painting, Oil Painting, Pencil Drawings, Abstract Art, Water Colours.
